path: artifacts/Project Play Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.CoinToken: contracts/Project Play Full Smart Contract Security Audit/CoinToken

findings.title: Out of Gas
findings.description: Functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can lead to `OUT_OF_GAS` exceptions if the excluded addresses list is long.

findings.title: Owner Privileges
findings.description: Owner can change charity address and fees when not renounced.
